title: Pixel 3 xl Battery draining fast
content:
Battery saver is on, adaptive battery is on, There aren't any major battery draining apps in battery usage. Text message app is my most used. I do have Samsung gear S3 watch that is connected Bluetooth. But WiFi and location is turned off at all times.
Battery lasts a couple of hours before it's dead.  I'm always trying to charge it up.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
